Comments_List: Individual research, data analysis, report writing
Great adviser, but disorganized as a course and little cohesion across the entire department.

There needs to be a better set of guidelines. I was very confused beginning of the semester on the process of selecting an adviser or what topics were eligible for a senior thesis. The only guidance I had during this process was a list of example senior projects from the past. These examples varied massively in detail and length and thus were hard to use as a standard.
